name: Melia Vinpearl Quang Binh
address: Quach Xuan Ky Street Quach Xuan Ky Street, Ðồng Hới, Việt Nam
description:
Melia Vinpearl Quang Binh có trung tâm thể dục, phòng chờ chung, nhà hàng và quầy bar ở Ðồng Hới. Khách sạn 5 sao này có máy ATM và dịch vụ tiền sảnh. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng có điều hòa, bàn làm việc, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi sen. Các phòng có tủ quần áo.

Chỗ nghỉ có phục vụ bữa sáng hằng ngày, gồm các lựa chọn thực đơn buffet, kiểu lục địa và kiểu Á.

Chỗ nghỉ có hồ bơi trong nhà, tiệm làm tóc và dịch vụ văn phòng ngay trong khuôn viên.

Melia Vinpearl Quang Binh cách Bãi biển Nhật Lệ 1.9 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Đồng Hới, cách chỗ nghỉ 7 km.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Cortesia e professionalità dello staff.
Ottima comunicazione ed organizzazione delle escursioni: Phong Nha Ke Bang e Zona Demilitarizzata. La guida ed il guidatore ci sono venuti a prendere direttamente all'aeroporto.
review.comment_negative: L'escursione al parco Phong Nha Ke Bang aveva una guida turistica non all'altezza. Era spesso distratta dal cellulare e per i fatti propri (l'autista invece è stato disponibile e premuroso). Durante la visita nella zona demilitarizzata la guida è stata praticamente inutile. Ha fatto due parole e ci ha scattato qualche fotografia. Non ci ha illustrato ciò che è avvenuto in quella zona del mondo e ci ha fatto saltare la base di Con Thien.

review.rating: Quand la quantité prime sur la qualité.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: La vue est sympa car nous étions à l' avant dernier étage. L' emplacement est bien, à côté des centres d' intérêts. Lit grand et confortable.
review.comment_negative:
Niveau d' anglais du personnel très moyen. Beaucoup de difficulté pour se faire comprendre. Pourtant aucun soucis dans tous les autres hôtels. Personnel mal renseigné pour les activités. Nous voulions faire une excursion au Parc National de Phong Nha, sans tour opérateur. On nous a certifié que cela n' était pas possible, et pourtant... nous avons pu passer une très bonne journée sans guide. 
Au premier abord, l' hôtel semble luxueux. Mais il s' avére que ce n' est que du luxe d' apparence. Plus du " Toc blingbling" que de la véritable qualité. Douche cassée, pas très agréable quand on arrive dans la chambre après 8h de route. Nous avons voulu trouver du réconfort en prenant un bon repas à l' hôtel... mais malheureusement, la nourriture était juste mauvaise et très chère... soupe incipide, plats mal assaisonnés, sans goûts. Nous avons pu voir les coulisses de la cuisine, soit des spagetthis Barilla ou des conserves Heinz de sauce tomates... à ce prix là, franchement, on se paie un peu notre tête. Viande qui fait peur. Pourtant situé à 200m du marché local. Ce n' est pas digne d ' un 5*. D' autres hôtels, 3* ou 4*, sont bien mieux avec une qualité nettement supérieure. Equipement pas pratique, bruits assourdissant, impossible de l'éteindre, climatisation non intuitive. Mini bar très cher et peu fourni. Faux marbre, fausse dorure, faux luxe. Intérieur des placards sales. De la poussières, des traces marrons non identifiées... miam. Quelques membres du personnels furent agréables, mais l' ensemble reste très peu aimables. Cela sent très clairement l' hôtel du tourisme de masse. Odeur de cigarette persistante dans les couloirs. Il n' y a pas de balcon ni d' espace fumeur.On sent que l' hôtel privilégie la quantitié que la qualité. Je ne recommande pas du tout.

review.rating: Unbearable cigarette smoke goes from one room to the other with doors shut affecting well being and sleep!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
In general the hotel looked nice and had everything one would need, located right in the river bank and above a small mall. 
The room was spacious and clean. The Spa and gym were also very nice and well maintained!
review.comment_negative:
However, even though the amenities were good, there were was one major real disappointments that needs to be shared and addressed by hotel management for all future guests!
We booked a non-smoking room, but after the first night we smelled cigarette smoke in our room and also on the hallway. Thus addressed the issue at the reception and they wanted to check it, also providing us the information that there are only non smoking rooms.
However, next day we smelled the smoke again in the late afternoon & evening hours and found out that riggt across the hallway there was a smoking guest room, where one guest apparently smoked cigarettes the whole time. Due to the fact that both his and our hotel room doors had roughly 5cm space beneath it the smoke could easily pass through and into our room, which was just disgusting!

During our stay we found out that there were less than 30 guests in the hotel, since there was no breakfast buffet (information provided by front desk). So here is a hint for the hotel management: If your occupancy is at around 5-10% of full capacity, then please just don’t put smokers and non smokers right across the hallway when there are several other rooms per floor or even full floors empty! Or as another option, just make specified full smoking zones/floors where all rooms are for smokers! Thereby, you won’t have these issues of customers being really unsatisfied and having a bad time staying in your hotel due to disgusting cigarette smoke!

And yes, I get it that the pst couple of years were really hard on the tourist industry around the world and in Vietnam probably as well. However, we are talking about the health of your customers that is unwillingly being affected.

review.comment_negative:
The location is terrible. Very little in the way of things to do. No bars what-so-ever in the area and in terms of restaurants the selection is limited as everything closes at 9pm.

I was also made quite ill from the breakfast on the morning of our checkout which ended our stay quite badly.i had to go to the airport with a sick bag in the taxi. 

On top of that, we were lead to believe that the bar had a "2for1 happy hour" option on drinks as the staff positioned a sign in the seating area of the bar. We had our drinks and after going to pay were told the happy hour only applied to CAKES!!!!!!? What crazy rubbish! Who in their right minds has a happy hour for cakes and then displays the sign in the bar. Utter stupidity and frankly it just seemed like a way to squeeze money out of people in a sneaky way. We complained sternly and were refunded the money. Honestly it ruined out faith in the staff and management despite the reimbursement. 

Rooftop bar as advertised was not open or stocked to receive customers. 

Based on the experience I could confidently say I would not stay here again.

review.rating: Un très bon hôtel pour un bon prix
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Cet hôtel est un très bon hôtel 5 étoiles avec concierge, piscine, buffet déjeuner et certainement d'autres prestations que je n'ai pas utilisées. La chambre que j'avais était très confortable et grande, et surtout elle était très silencieuse, ce qui est un réel soulagement lorsqu'on traverse le Vietnam. J'étais au 15ème étage et on n'entend pas les bruits de la ville.
Le buffet déjeuner est très bon et plusieurs choses changent chaque jour. Dans le complexe de l'hôtel, juste à côté, il y a un Vincom Plaza avec un grand winmart, donc pour faire des courses c'est très pratique, il y a même quelques plats tout prêts à emporter.
review.comment_negative: Seules ombres au tableau, j'ai trouvé que certaines réceptionnistes ne maîtrisaient pas du tout suffisamment l'anglais, ce qui pour un hôtel de ce calibre n'est pas très bon. Et la réception a été incapable de me renseigner sur les bus locaux, le staff a probablement trop l'habitude des touristes qui n'utilisent que le taxi. Et pour finir, je ne sais pas quoi dire par rapport à l'emplacement de l'hôtel car je n'ai pas réussi à savoir s'il était bien placé ou pas par rapport au reste de la ville. Il est à 45 minutes de marche de la gare, et un peu moins de la plage. L'emplacement en lui-même est joli, à côté de la rivière, on a une jolie vue depuis les étages supérieurs, mais il n'y a pas grand chose autour de l'hôtel et pas beaucoup d'options de restaurants (je peux recommander le quan anh thuan dans la rue co tam). Du coup, je ne sais pas si c'est le meilleur emplacement dans dong hoi.

review.rating: Absolutely fantastic stay, would come back and recommend
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
We had a wonderful experience in this hotel!It started right at check in, with Nhan from the reception desk. She was super helpful, friendly, personable and efficient. She delivered a wow effect by thinking for us, booking our train tickets for the next day, and offering a late checkout :)

At the spa, Loan gave me the best head, shoulders and back massage I ever had! She was very attentive and careful.

The breakfast was very good, and the staff were attentive. I had forgotten to pick up a spoon for my yogurt, and before I could get up, one was handed out to me!

To be noted also, absolutely every staff member was perfect, smiling and courteous, without exception. Most of them have good English proficiency.

The bed was very comfortable, with 3 good different pillows for each guest.

The food at the restaurant is very good and constant. Room service was top notch!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: The hotel was beautiful. The highlights were the incredible breakfast, fast wifi, heated indoor pool, and outdoor Garbo bar where you could watch the sunset. The shower and bath were great and the aircon worked perfectly and wasn't too loud. The staff at the restaurants, especially the hostess, were so warm and lovely. I had a massage in the spa which was also fantastic.
review.comment_negative: The bed was rock hard, and the pillow were so soft and didn't have much substance to them so my parter got neck pain every morning. We asked if there were firmer pillows we could switch to but this was not possible. The Garbo restaurant was beautiful but the menu was very limited as many of the meals (especially the vegetarian ones) were not available. This is perhaps because the hotel wasn't very busy. Overall the two restaurant menus didn't have many vegetarian options.

review.rating: Beatiful hotel in a not so wonderful town
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
This is a 5 star luxury at a very reasonable price.
It has extremely clean, spacious and comfortable bedrooms.
The YHI spa is magnificent - the setting, the staff and the comfort were all first class. The massage was the best I have ever had.
The gym was excellent, spacious and very well equipped.
Breakfast was superb, so much choice in beatiful surroundings.
The lobby and bar/lounge area were first class.
The tour organised by the hotel to Phong Nha Caves was brilliant and very good value for money.
review.comment_negative:
The only possible complaint is that other than using this wonderful hotel as a base for exploring Phong Nha caves, there is very little else to see or do in Dong Hoi - there are no museums, places of interest or a proper town centre. We found it very hard to find decent eating places in the vicinity - so we ate in the hotel restaurant, where the food was very good, but we were the only customers all night - a rather soulless experience in such lovely surroundings.

One final thing, all the windows could do with a good cleaning!!

They even prepared a delicious birthday cake for me and let us check in as soon as we arrived in the city on the night train.

review.comment_positive:
Fantastique !
Nous avons adoré cet hôtel qui a tout pour plaire. L'accueil est très sympa et charmant. La chambre Deluxe est magnifique, spacieuse, lumineuse, avec douche et baignoire (eau chaude et jet parfaits), 3 coussins et un matelas très confortables. Une grande lampe de chevet. Le spa est très élégant et très bien conçu avec des filles adorables. Les prix sont très attractifs et nous avons beaucoup apprécié le massage et le soin visage. La piscine est extraordinaire !! La salle de sport est très classe et très bien équipée. Dans tous les services l'accueil a été irréprochable. Nous n'avons pas testé le petit dej. Vous pouvez utiliser Grab pour aller au parc national Phong Nah Ke Bang.

review.comment_positive: La habitación, el desayuno, las instalaciones y el spa... Todo. Tuvimos que hacer un tiempo de espera más largo de lo que esperábamos y lo pasamos dentro del hotel, para el cual el personal no nos puso ninguna pega y nos ayudó en todo momento, siempre con una sonrisa.
review.comment_negative: La piscina estaba abarrotada de niñ@s. Parece ser que la utilizan para clases de natación de gente local. El caso es que nos resultó casi imposible hacer un par de largos en ella porque el kaos de la piscina, los niños y las niñas saltando a ella de repente etc... lo complicaron un poco.

review.comment_positive: Phòng sạch sẽ, decor hợp lý, tiện dụng. Cửa phòng view sông rất đẹp, tôi có thể nhìn thấy cả biển ở phía xa, đằng sau sông Nhật Lệ. Thái độ nhân viên dễ chịu, nhiệt tình và mến khách. Từ trong phòng, qua cửa kính tôi có thể ngắm hoàng hôn rất đẹp.
review.comment_negative: Giường cỡ lớn được ghép lại từ 2 giường đơn, điều này tạo một chút không thoải mái khi sử dụng. Cửa kính view phố có lẽ khá lâu chưa được lau dọn.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: El hotel es muy confortable con habitaciones muy grandes, camas muy cómodas, un placer por donde se lo vea.
review.comment_negative: Habiendo una pileta para niños y una para adultos ambas estaban ocupadas con niños tomando clases de natación lo que hacia que no fuera nada confortable su uso. Viendo que no era agradable por el ruido quisimos ocupar el yacuzzi pero hay que abonar extra, es decir no hay un lugar para el relax en el agua porque en uno esta lleno de niños y en el otro hay que abonar extra.

review.comment_positive: Beautiful and spacious rooms, spotless bathroom. Staff were absolutely lovely and helpful with everything. The breakfast!!! Best breakfast we’ve had in any hotel, period. It’s also close to the local markets and some small cafes and restaurants, so overall, no substantial complaints with this hotel at all. Even the price is quite decent for what you’re getting

review.rating: Tred bon hôtel confortable avec piscine chauffée
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Personnel d’accueil de l’hôtel agréable, parlant anglais. chambre spacieuse. salle de bain, chambre et linge propre. piscine intérieure bien chaude avec serviette de piscine à disposition. 
Situation correcte. 
Petit-dejeuner : choix assez large, bon mais cher 250000Dong par personne.
review.comment_negative:
service de lingerie hors de prix !! 
le restaurant Rumba (restaurant de l’hôtel au 5e étage) moyen : difficulté de compréhension avec le client. Ex : mon mari a commandé une pina colaDa, on lui amène un mojito. Je dis donc, en anglais, excusez-moi la commande n’était pas un mojito mais une pina colaDa. ils tergiversent puis reprennent le verre et une autre personne revient avec la carte est nous dit qu’il n’y en a plus de pina colada et plus non plus de mojito… (euuuh vous ne venez pas d’amener un mojito…), très étrange. 
Après notre plat était très bon. Mais le service compliqué, encore des problématiques de communication (souvent retrouvé au Vietnam durant notre séjour…)

review.rating: Really good and the caves in Phòng Nhã is worth visit in the off season (start February).
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: The staff helped us with the tour booking to the two caves in Phòng Nhã. It was absolutely great and adjusted for our needs with two small kids. We planned the tour an hour earlier (7 am instead of 8 am) and we were one of the first to visit the cave that morning. The guide was really good. The tour and guide exceeded our expectations - and we can really recommend this.
review.comment_negative: The floor in the pool was very slippery when it got wet. The hotel has mat to reduce but not on the entire floor.
